src:
FOTO: Zmelkoow v Hangarju z gosti ob 25-letnici prvenca
02 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Spletno uredništvo

Skupina Zmelkoow je v s koncertom v izolskem Hangarju v družbi gostov in polne terase obiskovalcev sinoči praznovala četrtstoletnico prvenca Kdo se je zbral?, ki je izšel 1. novembra leta 1994.



Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

IZOLA > Izvirnemu triu - pevcu in kitaristu Gorazdu Sedmaku - Gogi, basistu Žaretu Pavletič in bobnarju Damjanu Barutu, ki ga je kasneje zamenjal Aleš Koščak, so se pridružili kitaristi Maurizio Ratoša, Drago Favento in Andrea F, producent, ki je bend v prvi polovici devetdesetih snemal v piranskem studiu Tartini.



Več o pripravah na koncert: “Danes ni dobro bit mrtev”

text:
PHOTO: Zmelkoow in Hangar with guests celebrating their 25th anniversary
02 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Web Editing

The Zmelkoow band celebrated the four-month anniversary of the debut of Who Gathered ?, released on November 1, 1994, with a concert in the Hangar of Izola in the company of guests and a full terrace of visitors.



Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

IZOLA> The original trio - singer and guitarist Gorazd Sedmak - Goga, bassist Zaret Pavletic and drummer Damjan Barut - later replaced by Ales Koscak - were joined by guitarists Maurizio Ratos, Drago Favento and Andrea F, producer of the band in the first half In the 1990s he was recording at the Tartini studio in Piran.



More on the preparations for the concert: "It's not good to be dead today"
